system.requirements:
Tier 1; is an Ogryn 
Aptitudes: Fellowship, Leadership
system.effect: Character does not suffer penalties to Fellowship Tests due to being an Ogryn and/or not being taken seriously, and can re-roll one failed Charm Test per game session.

description.value: Character does not suffer penalties to Fellowship Tests due to being an Ogryn and/or not being taken seriously, and can re-roll one failed Charm Test per game session.
